metadata.title: CVE-2017-9754 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The process_otr function in bfd/versados.c in the Binary File Descriptor(BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, does notvalidate a certain offset, which allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated bymishandling of this file during "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
